acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using FundEd, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you may not use our platform.

platform.title: 2. Platform Description
platform.content: FundEd is a crowdfunding platform that connects verified students with donors to support educational needs. We facilitate the connection but are not a party to the funding relationship.

studentResp.title: 3. Student Responsibilities
items: Provide accurate and truthful information in your student profile
Submit legitimate verification documents
Use funds for the stated educational purposes
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Maintain the accuracy of campaign information

donorResp.title: 4. Donor Responsibilities
items: Donations are voluntary and non-refundable unless required by law
Donors understand that FundEd is a platform facilitator, not a guarantor
Donors are responsible for their own tax implications

verification.title: 5. Verification Process
verification.content: Student verification is conducted by our admin team. We reserve the right to:
items: Request additional verification documents
Reject verification applications at our discretion
Revoke verification status if information is found to be inaccurate

payment.title: 6. Payment Processing
payment.content: Payments are processed through Stripe. FundEd does not store credit card information. All payment disputes should be directed to Stripe or your financial institution.

prohibited.title: 7. Prohibited Activities
items: Provide false or misleading information
Use the platform for illegal purposes
Impersonate others or misrepresent your identity
Interfere with the platform's operation
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the platform

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: FundEd acts as a platform facilitator. We are not responsible for the accuracy of campaign information, the use of funds by students, or disputes between students and donors.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activity.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Account information (name, email address) when you sign up
Student profile information (university, field of study, country) for verification
Campaign information (title, description, funding goals)
Payment information processed securely through Stripe
Verification documents submitted for student verification

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process and verify student applications
Process donations and payment transactions
Send you transactional emails (verification status, donation confirmations)
Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
Comply with legal obligations

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With payment processors (Stripe) to process donations
With service providers who assist in operating our platform
When required by law or to protect our rights
Public campaign information (name, campaign details) as displayed on campaign pages

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate information
Request deletion of your account and data
Opt out of non-transactional communications

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the support channels provided on the platform.

nature.title: Platform Nature
nature.content: FundEd is a crowdfunding platform that facilitates connections between verified students and donors. We are a technology platform, not a financial institution, charity, or educational institution.

guarantees.title: No Guarantees
items: That campaigns will reach their funding goals
That students will use funds as stated in their campaigns
The accuracy of information provided by students
The success of any educational endeavor

verification.title: Verification Disclaimer
verification.content: While we verify student status through document review, verification does not constitute:
items: Endorsement of the student's campaign
Guarantee of campaign success
Verification of the student's financial need
Assurance of fund usage compliance

risks.title: Donation Risks
items: Donations are voluntary contributions, not purchases
FundEd does not provide refunds except as required by law
Donors are responsible for their own tax reporting
There is no guarantee that campaign goals will be met

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
items: Stripe for payment processing
Cloudinary for file storage
Google OAuth for authentication
thirdParty.disclaimer: We are not responsible for the actions, policies, or services of these third parties.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, FundEd shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the platform.
